body_html:
@mrry
Thank you so much for the help. I have been trying to get this working for weeks....and now it finally does.

steps I took to fix:

  1. searched my c drive for that exact name
  2. it was located in my CUDA 10v bin, but NOT in my CUDA 9v.
  3. I copied and pasted, and everything is working alright.

body:
@mrry 
Thank you so much for the help. I have been trying to get this working for weeks....and now it finally does.

steps I took to fix:
1) searched my c drive for that exact name
2) it was located in my CUDA 10v bin, but NOT in my CUDA 9v. 
3) I copied and pasted, and everything is working alright.
